summary_teim: Ray Charles, Sam Cooke, Jimmie Rodgers are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame at its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
summary_ssm: Ray Charles, Sam Cooke, Jimmie Rodgers are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame at its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
contents_teim: Quincy Jones inducts Ray Charles -- Charles accepts his award -- Jann Wenner inducts Sam Cooke, introduces Herb Alpert -- Alpert inducts Sam Cooke -- Barbara Cooke and Rev. Charles Cooke accept the award -- Ertegun speaks on early influences -- Wenner inducts Jimmie Rodgers, introduces Jerry Wexler -- Wexler inducts Rodgers.
contents_ssm: Quincy Jones inducts Ray Charles -- Charles accepts his award -- Jann Wenner inducts Sam Cooke, introduces Herb Alpert -- Alpert inducts Sam Cooke -- Barbara Cooke and Rev. Charles Cooke accept the award -- Ertegun speaks on early influences -- Wenner inducts Jimmie Rodgers, introduces Jerry Wexler -- Wexler inducts Rodgers.

abstract_ssm: This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Quincy Jones inducts Ray Charles -- Ray Charles acceptance speech -- Sam Cooke montage -- Jann Wenner introduces Sam Cooke -- Herb Alpert inducts Sam Cooke -- Sam Cooke's family accepts the award on his behalf -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces early influences category -- Jann Wenner introduces Jimmie Rodgers -- Jerry Wexler inducts Jimmie Rodgers -- Family of Jimmie Rodgers accepts the award on his behalf
